meanings.definition: To make small or reduce in size.
meanings.sent1: I will micrify this cake by cutting it into tiny pieces.
meanings.sent2: The machine can micrify large rocks into small pebbles.
meanings.sent3: She tried to micrify her huge backpack by removing unnecessary items.
meanings.sent4: The artist's goal was to micrify the grand painting into a miniature masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The magician used his wand to micrify the elephant into a tiny toy.

meanings.definition: To shrink or diminish in scale.
meanings.sent1: The hot water caused the plastic cup to micrify and warp.
meanings.sent2: Over time, the fabric will micrify if washed in hot water.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's power was to micrify objects to fit in his pocket.
meanings.sent4: The budget cuts forced the company to micrify its operations.
meanings.sent5: The wizard's spell made the giant's sword micrify to the size of a toothpick.
